pkgmetadata.longdescription: FAB Confidence Intervals // Frequentist assisted by Bayes (FAB) confidence interval construction. See 'Adaptive multigroup confidence intervals with constant coverage' by Yu and Hoff DOI:10.1093/biomet/asy009 and 'Exact adaptive confidence intervals for linear regression coefficients' by Hoff and Yu DOI:10.1214/18-EJS1517.
